name: Collector
description: Collector. Implementation contract that must be initialized using transparent proxy pattern. Stores the fees collected by the protocol and allows the fund administrator to approve or transfer the collected ERC20 tokens.

functionDecorators.name: approve
functionDecorators.description: Approve an amount of tokens to be pulled by the recipient.

parameterDecorators.name: recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the entity allowed to pull tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount allowed to be pulled. If zero it will revoke the approval.

returnDecorators.description: The address of the funds administrator.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initialize the transparent proxy with the admin of the Collector.

parameterDecorators.name: reserveController
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the admin that controls Collector.

functionDecorators.name: setFundsAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Transfer the ownership of the funds administrator role. This function should only be callable by the current funds administrator.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new funds administrator.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: Transfer an amount of tokens to the recipient.

parameterDecorators.name: recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the entity to transfer the tokens.
